item.description:
THE IRA’S SINGLES EVENTS

PRESENTS:

ANOTHER

TERRIFIC HAPPY HOUR

A GORGEOUS SETTING, TERRIFIC FOOD,LIQUID LIBATIONS, LIVE BAND TO DANCE THE NIGHT AWAY

(Not Bad for a Friday Night)




The Details:


DATE: Friday ,July 9. , “ 6 p.m. to ?. We have our own Private Dining Room and Bar on the 2nd Floor, and the outdoor deck overlooking the Lake Pocotopaug, a crystal clear lake with many boats to view as well.

.LOCATION: Angelico’s Lake House Restaurant ,81 North Main Street,
East Hampton, CT 06424-1433,(860) 267-1276. ( It is about 20 min. from Hartford, and well worth the short drive) http://www.angelicosl...

MUSIC DETAILS: The name of the band is: The Johnny Larson Band. See: http://www.myspace.co.... R&B/Funk/Blues

FOOD AND LIBATIONS: The terrific specials are from 6 p.m. to 8p.m. A regular dinner menu is available as well. Specials are listed below. How cool is: Mac & Cheese with Lobster, now that is Special for sure…………..

R.S.V.P Information: On or before July 8 . Small cover of $5.00. How can you go wrong?
Please email: Mistrchrming@aol.com . Subject Line July 9 Happy Hour
Questions: 860-604-5792
The Ira’s Motto: Come alone, but, never feel alone.


HAPPY HOUR BAR SPECIALS

Colossal Shrimp 2.00 each Buffalo Chicken Dip 3.00 Fried Calamari 3.00 Cheeseburger 3.00 Fish & Chips 3.00 Sweet Potato Fries 3.00 Fried Ravioli 3.00 Buffalo Popcorn Shrimp 3.00 Mac & Cheese with Lobster 3.00 Buffalo Wings 3.00


Martini 4.99 Margarita 4.99 Frozen Drinks 4.99 Domestic Bottles 2.99 Imported Bottles 3.99 Draft Pints 2.99 Guinness Pint 3.99

NOTE: The previous event at Anglelico had a few wait staff issues. I have worked with the owner, Paul, who will be prepared for our group arrival.
item.how_to_find_us: A host or hostess will direct you to our exlcusive area. Party On !!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Ira- A Terrific Happy Hour with a Gorgeous Setting,Live Music, Great Food
